rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.vastu_note: Ensure entrance is aligned with magnetic north for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.vastu_note: Placing living room in east enhances activity and positivity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.vastu_note: The dining area benefits from the energetic north-east direction for prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.vastu_note: The kitchen is placed in the south to balance energies with caution.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.vastu_note: The bedroom in north-west encourages restful sleep and mental clarity.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.vastu_note: Placing the guest room here ensures good energy for visitors.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.vastu_note: The bathroom in south-east supports purification and balance.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.vastu_note: Although west is generally avoided for main living areas, the library can utilize this space by ensuring proper lighting and ventilation.

rooms.name: Study/Work Area
rooms.vastu_note: The work area is placed in east to boost creativity and productivity.

additional_notes.vastu_compliance: Carefully arranged room directions to align with Vastu principles while accounting for west-facing plot.
additional_notes.structural_requirements: Ensure load-bearing walls are in compliance with local building norms. Use natural light and ventilation techniques.
